articles.title: IndiGo Orders 500 Aircraft As Part Of Expansion Plan To Reach Europe - NDTV
articles.description: IndiGo has partnered with Turkish airlines to expand its reach to Europe and has ordered nearly 500 more aircraft as part of its expansion plan, said Vinay Malhotra, Head of International Sales.
articles.content:
IndiGo is currently flying 1,800 flights a day and 10 per cent of them on international routes.

articles.title: How much damage to SA will its naval exercise with Russia do? - BusinessLIVE
articles.description: ‘Some companies have asked us if it is still safe to engage with SA for business, because they fear possible consequences,’ a European ambassador say
